text.text: 摘 要：在大数据时代，推荐系统提高了信息获取和分发的效率，但现有的推荐方法和效果还有很大的提升空间，

word.text: 在大数据时代，推荐系统提高了信息获取和分发的效率，但现有的推荐方法和效果还有很大的提升空间，

text.text: Abstract: The recommendation system has improved the efficiency of information acquisition and distribution in the age of big

word.text: The recommendation system has improved the efficiency of information acquisition and distribution in the age of big

text.text: data, but the existing recommendation methods and effects still have much room for improvement, requiring more investment and

word.text: data, but the existing recommendation methods and effects still have much room for improvement, requiring more investment and

text.text: research. In the recall stage, this paper uses multi way fusion. The fused list weighs the average scores of the items in the ItemCF

word.text: research. In the recall stage, this paper uses multi way fusion. The fused list weighs the average scores of the items in the ItemCF

text.text: algorithm and FM list, so that the model can obtain a higher recall rate than the single recall method when the number of candidate

word.text: algorithm and FM list, so that the model can obtain a higher recall rate than the single recall method when the number of candidate

text.text: sets N is the same. In the sorting stage, the optimized Deep Interest Network(DIN) model is used. Compared with other models, its

word.text: is the same. In the sorting stage, the optimized Deep Interest Network(DIN) model is used. Compared with other models, its

text.text: AUC index is significantly improved, which verifies the superiority of the optimized DIN model.

word.text: AUC index is significantly improved, which verifies the superiority of the optimized DIN model.
